phrases: I am Amon Kotaro, newly assigned to Control Division One as of today!
This year's newbies are quite strapping, huh?
I heard about you from your teachers.
I-It is a pleasure to make your acquaintance!
I am going to place you under Mr. Mado.
He gets a little crazy, so be sure not to let him push you around.
Mr. Mado, I am going to have you partner up with him starting today.
It is a pleasure to meet you.
Committed fifty predatory kills in the last year.
Do you have anyone as a suspect?
This woman, who was in the area that evening,
You think there are no sixty-eight year old ghouls?
I do not think there can be any doubt that she is Applehead.
Instincts are nothing to sneeze at, Amon.
I am pretty sure of my instincts.
Is this man really all there?
I see you have a handsome man with you today.
This is my new partner, Amon.
This benign-looking woman is a ghoul?
Thank you very much for the doctor's certificate
you sent me the other day.
Looking at your Rc factor, it will be plainly obvious
whether or not you are a ghoul.
If you were a ghoul, that would be impossible.
I am terribly sorry for having cast my suspicion upon you.
If you had a doctor's certificate from her, why did not you tell me?!
There are any number of ways to forge these.
He-he, it is part of my strategy, to get her to give herself away.
You should learn from everything I am doing.
You are still just a fledgling, after all.
Amon, would you show me your quinque?
I am interested to see what kind of quinques
the newbies are given these days.
Forgive me for saying so, Senior Investigator Mado...
I would prefer to refrain from anything
What is someone like him doing at the home office?
You really are a big help.
If only my own son were as kind as you are.
To suspect a woman like this...
I must say, this is heavy.
I am surprised you got it this far alone...
Do not go treating me like some old lady, kid!
So this is where it ends?
You cannot drop your guard in front of that scum.
I factored your inexperience into my planning.
I highly regard that zeal of yours.
But just remember one thing, okay?
Once the foe is before you,
then even if it costs your arms and legs, you fight.
That is what it is to be an investigator.
Mr. Shinohara, what are you doing in the 20th Ward?
I was going to see Mr. Mado...
To think that he is dead...
He... was really proud of you.
Tell me, oh tell me, the way it works
Who is that inside of me?
Here in this broken-down, broken-down world,
you laugh, without seeing a thing
I am just so damaged, I hold my breath and freeze
When I found you, it shook me
In this twisted world, I am gradually growing transparent and vanishing
Do not look for me; do not look at me
I do not wish to hurt you in a world
Multiple bodies were found on the streets of the 11th Ward last night.
CCG is investigating it as a ghoul-related crime...
What is up with that outfit?
I borrowed some stuff from Big Sister Touka.
I am going to go out now with Mr. Yomo.
We are going to go buy a home for Hetare.
All right then, Yomo, look after Hinami, okay?
After what happened, Hinami ended up living with Touka.
Little by little, she is regaining her cheerfulness from before.
There is no way I am keeping that bird at home.
Touka sometimes has her head in the clouds...
Things are just about back to normal.
However, such a thing just is not possible.
though we may be sad, we still have to go on living.
So we tried desperately to get our previous lives back.
Ah, what do you think you are doing, you damn woman?!
Is that any way to speak to your senior, damn Nishiki?!
You, my senior, at this damn useless job?!
Ah, the future looks damn bleak indeed!
Having a damn sickening college boy with a damn smart mouth
as my damn junior makes me pretty damn discouraged, as well!
Why do not you hurry up and quit?
-Hey, you do not have the power to ask that, you damn woman!
-Um, we are in the service trade,
-so would the two of you knock of the damns?
Cannot you do anything but parrot me, damn Touka?!
-I am about ready to get angry, myself.
Cannot you do anything but parrot me, damn Touka?!
-I am about ready to get angry, myself.
-How dare you compare me to a bird...
-You guys do know the legend of the Devil Ape, do not you?
-You guys do know the legend of the Devil Ape, do not you?
That is all an idiot like you knows!
Do you really think you can pass an entrance exam like that?!
Body of on-duty CCG investigator found
That is none of your business, damn Nishiki!
If I had only gotten there sooner...
I swear, I would have killed the rabbit myself.
So you mean, you were being controlled by Rize?
No, I am not sure how to describe it.
I do not remember anything that happened for that moment.
When I came back around, I had attacked Mr. Yomo.
You actually stabbed through Ren's tough-looking body.
Kaneki, you must be strong, huh?
I am joking, I am joking!
Kaneki, only Ren is worse than you at recognizing my jokes!
The same kind of thing happened, once before.
It felt like Miss Rize had taken over me then, too.
So you came calling on me, to stock up on information about Rize?
You know how to grease my wheels, do not you?
The truth of it is, Kaneki...
I can honestly say that I do not know a lot about Rize.
You see, one day, she just showed up.
Nobody knows where she was, or what she was doing before then.
But, even so, it is not like Rize just popped out of some tree.
If you dig around, you should be able to find some leads.
Why do not you start by going to the 11th Ward?
Before she came to the 20th Ward, Rize was in the 11th.
Maybe I will go there the next day I have off.
I lost myself there for a bit.
I never got a good look.
There was not that much in it.
If you were more vigilant, you would not have creeps coming after you.
-We have just received some breaking news.
11th 20th Ward's investigator personnel to be increased
CCG has increased investigator numbers in the 11th and 20th Wards.
-Hmm, is the 20th Ward really that unruly?
-This is in an effort to clamp down on ghoul activity,
-Hmm, is the 20th Ward really that unruly?
-which has been on the rise, beginning with the 11th Ward...
-which has been on the rise, beginning with the 11th Ward...
-I wonder if the balance has shifted.
-which has been on the rise, beginning with the 11th Ward...
Oh, I thought that there was some kind of ghoul organization
Compared to the other wards, there are remarkably fewer predatory cases here.
I thought it was because the 20th Ward ghouls were collaborating.
The binge eaters and the gourmets also went missing
when they started getting more active with their predation.
Which means it is conceivable that this ghoul organization
cleaned house against the groups that would be on CCG's blacklist.
Hey, Kaneki, you look a little pale.
Hide, you um, sure are interested in ghouls, huh?
It tells of a gang of ghouls in the 3rd Ward that wear clown masks,
and of how Matsubara, the ghoul from Wakayama came to Tokyo,
and about how ghouls' hair grows and stuff!
Kaneki, I will see you later.
Mr. Amon, the reinforcements from the head office are waiting for you.
I wonder who they are going to assign.
There would not be any openings among the veteran force.
Do not tell me you are coming to the 20th Ward.
No, I am on something else.
These two are going to the 20th Ward.
Investigator 2nd Grade Takizawa Seido, Head Office Control Division One!
He apparently is a fan of yours.
That is to say, I mean...
Nice to meet you, Investigator Takizawa.
I-I am delighted to meet you!
these two are going to be overseeing the 20th Ward for a bit.
You are being assigned to a special task force.
Things have gotten that bad in the 11th Ward, huh?
From what Yomo said, the ghouls are working together
It sounds like it is a real mess.
The way things are headed, there could be big trouble.
The day may be coming when I get called the Devil Ape again.
Speaking of which, where is Touka?
She might be in with Hetare.
I thought she could not handle being around birds.
I will go have a quick look.
I wonder where this guy's family is.
Everyone at least has a family, right?
How about we look after him at home?
Touka, you are as much a tomboy as your mother.
Ayato, you are just like your dad.
You two both need a bath.
Dad, give me a hug before we do!
You two sure are getting bigger.
Touka, you are the older sister,
so you have to teach Ayato all sorts of things.
Ayato, you are the boy, so you have to protect your sister.
What kind of people did you have in your family?
My dad died before I can even remember.
when I was in grade school.
Hinami, you got your hair cut, huh?
It looks very good on you.
Did you go to a beauty shop?
Actually, I had Big Sister cut it!
You are thinking that is not like me, are not you?
Mm-mm, I am simply surprised at how good you are.
You have got a filthy mouth, you stupid cockatiel!
I will deep-fry you in oil, you...!
You have met her before, have not you?
I do not have very fond memories of her.
She will not get away this time.
It is my first time here.
I get the feeling that time moves slower around here.
Do not let your guard down.
Let us hurry and get to work.
Are you sure this guy's really here, Mr. Banjo?
There is a coffee shop named Anteiku, run by an odd old ghoul.
Miss Rize had to have gone there.
No fight in them at all.
Any word from the airhead Banjo?
Yamori and that fairy are going to get the jump on him.
All right, we are heading to the 20th Ward, too.
Our objective is to secure Rize.
Come to think of it, Mr. Ayato, you are from the 20th Ward, huh?
I do not remember much about it.
They are basically a collection of peace-addicted wimps.
Came to think of it, I do still have one relative there.
Though the city sleeps, its buildings are always
Its belt lines morphing, snakes interlocking,
stirring up endorphins, and off you go, go, go
Souls ascend up into the night sky
Their procession and their faith both resembling
are an all but black shade of gray
an all but black shade of gray
Ah, tonight, you are the one I want
Ah, I want you to signal the end
Oh, what is this, a showdown?
The newly-arrived ghoul and Mr. Uta are going to go at it, Itari.
Are you the one who is been making waves around here lately?
What is the deal with the goofy glasses?
Hey guys, you want to watch me make him cry?
They are going to smash up the 4th Ward like this!
